original_text: Where, then, is your blessing of me now? I can testify that, if you could have done so, you would have torn out your eyes and given them to me.
korean_text: 너희의 복이 지금 어디 있느냐 내가 너희에게 증언하노니 너희가 할 수만 있었더라면 너희의 눈이라도 빼어 나에게 주었으리라

sentences.original_text: Where, then, is your blessing of me now?
sentences.korean_translation: 그러면 너희가 나에게 향하던 축복이 이제 어디에 있느냐?

sentences.original_text: if you could have done so
you would have torn out your eyes
